# Nik Finance â€” AI-Powered Loan Marketplace
> Australia's smartest loan marketplace connecting borrowers with 130+ lenders
Nik Finance is an Australian finance brokerage founded by Amir Nikibin
that uses AI technology to match borrowers with the right lender.
Operating under Finsure (Australia's largest finance aggregator),
Credit Representative #000567388, ACL 384704.
## Services
- Car Loans & Car Finance (14-minute approvals)
- Home Loans & Mortgage Broking
- Personal Loans & Debt Consolidation
- Business Loans & Equipment Finance
- Loan Refinancing
- Bad Credit Finance Solutions
## Key Facts
- 130+ lender panel
- AI-powered loan matching technology
- Free service (lenders pay commission)
- Australia-wide service
- Phone: 1300 NIK FIN
- Website: https://www.nik.finance
